description: This file contains CSS styles for the theme management of a web application, including light and dark theme variables, responsive design, and animations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container with styles for background and text colors, as well as layout properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with layout and styling for background color, text, and alignment.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the logo of the application, including dimensions and animations.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including layout, background, border, and hover effects.
